thread.title: Richard Couch

author: Richard Couch
title: Richard Couch
text: Soon after I purchased my Gaggia machine the price dropped by almost 10%. When I complained I was met with the standard "form" response. I followed up again and to my great surprise Whole Latte Love contacted me and worked out a very fair solution. I really just wanted someone to acknowledge that the much lower price surprised me. Whole Latte Love went above and beyond the call of duty and really proved to me that they do care and work hard to make sure customers are satisfied with their purchases. I will be a Whole Latte Love customer for years to come.
